message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $12,000. What do you think?
Alice,  $12,000 is way above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $8,500. This is my best offer.

I understand that $8,500 is your maximum budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll make a counteroffer of $10,500. This is my best price, and I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $10,500 is still too high for me. I'm firm on my offer of $8,500. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to go with John's offer.
